localResource.name: Storage_type
localResource.label: Storage_type
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT v3_2_enum_translator.value, v3_2_enum_translator.enum_key, 0 as sort FROM v3_2_enum_translator, v3_2_configuration_history_storage_domains, v3_2_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains WHERE v3_2_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_type = v3_2_enum_translator.enum_key AND v3_2_enum_translator.enum_type = 'STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE' AND v3_2_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id = v3_2_configuration_history_storage_domains.storage_domain_id AND v3_2_map_history_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) AND (detach_date < cast($P{P_End_Date} as date) + interval '1 day' OR detach_date IS NULL) AND attach_date >= cast($P{P_Start_Date} as timestamp) $P!{active_storage} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT value, -1, 1 FROM v3_2_enum_translator WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, value
